name: Jim's Challenge
description:
A Quick Game for a Quick Time!

Jim is an average chap who is just strolling down the gardens. However, one false step and now he finds himself in a weird maze, full of water, lava, ice, balls and traps. Only you can guide him out of that mad world!

Inspired by Chip's Challenge, this game is a nice mostly-fast paced game where you go through a maze and solve puzzles and get all the master keys to open the door to the next maze. Each one has a lot more stuff to do, so keep your attention up, more can come, but you can do it! :D

1. Is this game free?

Yes! Go ahead and download that bad boy. No strings attached, no sneaky hooded man trying to sell you loot boxes.

2. I wanna donate to you, this game ruled.

Go ahead, though I'm still working on getting the money thing done. A lot of papers to sign, business big man in big suits with a happy face button on their sharp hat.

3. Can I eat the keys?

Hmm,  I can make a chocolate one. How about that?

4. I wanna check more of your stuff!

Go to my studio's discord, Coffee Firework Development, where we talk all day about stuff nobody cares about. (Warning: May contain adult content/swearing, keep those topics on their own channels!) Go in here!

More updates soon :o
